title: A Brief History of Earth - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/26/21
itunes:title: A Brief History of Earth - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/26/21
description:
George Noory and Harvard biology and planetary science professor Andy Knoll explore his research into how the planet was formed 4 billion years ago, what jumpstarted life on Earth, and the threats of asteroids and earthquakes that could end life as we know it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
